END_PACK bool ZGPL_IsValidSrcId ( uint32_t  srcId,
ZGP_FrameType_t  frameType,
bool  isPairingConfig 
)

To check whether the SrcID is valid or not considering the Frame Type.

Parameters:
[in]-srcId - GPD srcId frameType - Maintanence Frame/Data Frame isPairingConfig - srcId received in PairingConfig/Commissioning
Returns:
true if srcId is Valid false otherwise
